quoteText: You grant us broad rights to use and exploit Content you post or make available via the Myspace Services, your profile and activity information, and your name, persona and likeness, as more fully explained below. You will not be entitled to compensation or attribution even if we or others profit from such use.
title: The copyright license maintained by the service over user data and/or content is broader than necessary.
